rules_text:
Integrate the top two cards of target player’s library. They lose 2 life, and you gain 2 life. [i](To integrate a card, exile it, then you may choose a nonland permanent it’s integrated onto.)[/i]
Whenever a permanent you control with two or more cards integrated onto it dies, you may pay {B}. If you do, return Lure into Lunacy from your graveyard to your hand.
notes:
!canoncard Glimpse the Unthinkable
 101: Integrating is now optional.
